summary.span: 在运行时定义并创建类的新实例。

span.span: Defines and creates new instances of classes during run time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用于控制运行时中的动态类创建的根类。 is the root class used to control the creation of dynamic classes in the runtime. 它提供一的组用于定义类，添加方法和字段，并创建在模块内的类的例程。It provides a set of routines that are used to define classes, add methods and fields, and create the class inside a module. 一个新可以通过调用从动态模块创建方法，它返回对象。A new can be created from a dynamic module by calling the method, which returns a object. 反射发出提供了用于定义类型的以下选项：Reflection emit provides the following options for defining types: - 定义类或具有给定名称的接口。Define a class or interface with the given name. - 定义类或接口具有给定名称和属性。Define a class or interface with the given name and attributes. - 定义具有给定名称、 属性和基类的类。Define a class with the given name, attributes, and base class. - 定义具有给定名称、 属性、 基类和组的类实现的接口的类。Define a class with the given name, attributes, base class, and the set of interfaces that the class implements. - 定义具有给定名称、 属性、 基类和封装大小的类。Define a class with the given name, attributes, base class, and packing size. - 作为一个整体定义具有给定名称、 特性、 基本类和类大小的类。Define a class with the given name, attributes, base class, and the class size as a whole. - 作为一个整体定义具有给定名称、 属性、 基类、 封装大小和类大小的类。Define a class with the given name, attributes, base class, packing size, and the class size as a whole. 若要创建的数组类型、 指针类型或不完整类型所表示的 byref 类型对象，请使用方法，方法，或方法，分别。To create an array type, pointer type, or byref type for an incomplete type that is represented by a object, use the method, method, or method, respectively. 使用的类型之前，必须调用方法。Before a type is used, the method must be called. **CreateType**完成类型的创建过程。**CreateType** completes the creation of the type. 之后调用**CreateType**，调用方可以通过使用实例化类型方法，并使用调用该类型的成员方法。Following the call to **CreateType**, the caller can instantiate the type by using the method, and invoke members of the type by using the method. 它是错误调用更改后的类型实现的方法**CreateType**已调用。It is an error to invoke methods that change the implementation of a type after **CreateType** has been called. 例如，公共语言运行时引发异常，如果调用方尝试将新成员添加到一种类型。For example, the common language runtime throws an exception if the caller tries to add new members to a type. 通过创建一个类初始值设定项方法。A class initializer is created by using the method. **DefineTypeInitializer**返回对象。**DefineTypeInitializer** returns a object. 嵌套的类型定义通过调用之一方法。Nested types are defined by calling one of the methods. ## 特性Attributes 类使用枚举，以进一步指定要创建的类型的特征：The class uses the enumeration to further specify the characteristics of the type to be created: - 使用指定接口和属性。Interfaces are specified using the and attributes. - 使用指定具体类 （不能扩展的类）属性。Concrete classes (classes that cannot be extended) are specified using the attribute. - 多个属性确定类型可见性。Several attributes determine type visibility. 请参阅的说明枚举。See the description of the enumeration. - 如果类加载程序布局中，会在读取元数据中的顺序的字段的指定。If is specified, the class loader lays out fields in the order they are read from metadata. 类加载程序会考虑指定的封装大小，但会忽略任何指定的字段偏移量。The class loader considers the specified packing size but ignores any specified field offsets. 元数据保留在其中发出字段定义的顺序。The metadata preserves the order in which the field definitions are emitted. 即使在合并时，元数据不重新排序的字段定义。Even across a merge, the metadata will not reorder the field definitions. 加载程序将遵循指定的字段偏移量仅当指定。The loader will honor the specified field offsets only if is specified. ## 已知问题Known Issues - 反射发出不验证实现的接口的非抽象类是否实现该接口中声明的所有方法。Reflection emit does not verify whether a non-abstract class that implements an interface has implemented all the methods declared in the interface. 但是，如果类未实现接口中声明的所有方法，在运行时不会加载类。However, if the class does not implement all the methods declared in an interface, the runtime does not load the class. - 尽管派生自，在中定义的抽象方法的一些类中未完全实现类。Although is derived from , some of the abstract methods defined in the class are not fully implemented in the class. 对这些调用方法将引发异常。Calls to these methods throw a exception. 可以通过检索创建的类型使用获取所需的功能或和专用于反映将检索到的类型。The desired functionality can be obtained by retrieving the created type using the or and reflecting on the retrieved type. ## Examples 本部分包含两个代码示例。This section contains two code examples. 第一个示例演示如何创建具有字段、 构造函数、 属性和方法的动态类型。The first example shows how to create a dynamic type with a field, constructor, property, and method. 第二个示例生成从用户输入动态方法。The second example builds a method dynamically from user input. **示例 1****Example one** 下面的代码示例演示如何定义具有一个模块的动态程序集。The following code example shows how to define a dynamic assembly with one module. 该示例程序集中模块包含一个类型， `MyDynamicType`，其中具有私有字段、 获取和设置私有字段的属性、 构造函数初始化的私有字段和乘以用户提供的数字的私有字段的方法值并返回结果。The module in the example assembly contains one type, `MyDynamicType`, which has a private field, a property that gets and sets the private field, constructors that initialize the private field, and a method that multiplies a user-supplied number by the private field value and returns the result. 时创建该程序集指定字段。The field is specified when the assembly is created. 立即使用的程序集代码和程序集也会保存到磁盘，以便它可以使用检查[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)或其他程序中使用。The assembly code is used immediately, and the assembly is also saved to disk so that it can be examined with [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) or used in another program. [!code-cpp[AssemblyBuilderClass#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyBuilderClass/cpp/24895.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[AssemblyBuilderClass#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyBuilderClass/cs/24895.cs#1)] [!code-vb[AssemblyBuilderClass#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/AssemblyBuilderClass/vb/24895.vb#1)] **示例二****Example two** 下面的代码示例演示如何使用生成动态类型`TypeBuilder`。The following code sample demonstrates how to build a dynamic type by using `TypeBuilder`. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit ILGenerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit ILGenerator Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit ILGenerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit ILGenerator Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit ILGenerator Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit ILGenerator Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 将声明性安全添加到此类型。

span.span: Adds declarative security to this type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `AddDeclarativeSecurity` 不能调用多次，每次调用指定安全操作 （如需、 Assert 或拒绝） 和一组应用到操作的权限。`AddDeclarativeSecurity` may be called several times with each call specifying a security action (such as Demand, Assert, or Deny) and a set of permissions that apply to the action. > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0、 1.1 和 2.0 中，使用此方法应用于类型的声明性安全属性存储在旧的 XML 元数据格式。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0, 1.1, and 2.0, the declarative security attributes applied to a type by using this method are stored in the old XML metadata format. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何将`AddDeclarativeSecurity`方法添加的安全需求与到名为的动态类型的标志`MyDynamicClass`，名为 EmittedExample.dll 程序集中。The following example demonstrates the use of the `AddDeclarativeSecurity` method to add a security demand for with the flag to a dynamic type named `MyDynamicClass`, in an assembly named EmittedExample.dll. 该示例生成没有控制台输出;在运行后，可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)检查 EmittedExample.dll。The example produces no console output; after you run it, you can use [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine EmittedExample.dll. 在中`MyDynamicClass`，打开`.class public auto ansi`语句，以查看声明性权限。In `MyDynamicClass`, open the `.class public auto ansi` statement to see the declarative permission. [!code-cpp[TypeBuilder_AddDeclarativeSecurity#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_AddDeclarativeSecurity/CPP/typebuilder_adddeclarativesecurity.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TypeBuilder_AddDeclarativeSecurity#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_AddDeclarativeSecurity/CS/typebuilder_adddeclarativesecurity.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TypeBuilder_AddDeclarativeSecurity#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_AddDeclarativeSecurity/VB/typebuilder_adddeclarativesecurity.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此类型是嵌套的类型，嵌套类型上调用之前必须对封闭类型调用方法。If this type is a nested type, the method must be called on the enclosing type before it is called on the nested type. 如果当前类型派生自不完整类型或实现不完整的接口，则调用父类型和接口类型之前调用当前类型的方法。If the current type derives from an incomplete type or implements incomplete interfaces, call the method on the parent type and the interface types before calling it on the current type. 如果封闭类型包含一个字段，是值类型定义为嵌套类型 （例如，是一个枚举，定义为嵌套类型的字段），调用封闭类型的方法将生成事件。If the enclosing type contains a field that is a value type defined as a nested type (for example, a field that is an enumeration defined as a nested type), calling the method on the enclosing type will generate a event. 这是因为加载程序无法确定的封闭类型的大小，直到完成的嵌套的类型。This is because the loader cannot determine the size of the enclosing type until the nested type has been completed. 调用方应定义的处理程序事件，可以通过调用完成的嵌套类型定义上表示嵌套的类型的对象。The caller should define a handler for the event to complete the definition of the nested type by calling on the object that represents the nested type. 本主题的代码示例演示如何定义此类事件处理程序。The code example for this topic shows how to define such an event handler. 创建一个类型是一次，无论很多时候调用方法。A type is created only once, no matter how many times the method is called. 所有调用将都返回相同对象。All calls return the same object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何定义的事件处理程序事件，以便调用期间嵌套类型上的方法对封闭类型调用。The following code example shows how to define an event handler for the event, in order to call the method on a nested type during a call on the enclosing type. [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType Example/CPP/nestedenum.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType Example/CS/nestedenum.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.CreateType Example/VB/nestedenum.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果为动态类型未定义构造函数，自动提供默认构造函数并调用基类的默认构造函数。If you do not define a constructor for your dynamic type, a default constructor is provided automatically, and it calls the default constructor of the base class. 如果为动态类型定义构造函数，则不提供默认构造函数。If you define a constructor for your dynamic type, a default constructor is not provided. 必须提供默认构造函数，除了你定义的构造函数的以下选项：You have the following options for providing a default constructor in addition to the constructor you defined: - 如果您希望只需调用类的基类的默认构造函数的默认构造函数，则可以使用方法创建一个 （并根据需要限制对它的访问权限）。If you want a default constructor that simply calls the default constructor of the base class, you can use the method to create one (and optionally restrict access to it). 不提供此默认构造函数的实现。Do not provide an implementation for this default constructor. 如果这样做，当您尝试使用构造函数是引发异常。If you do, an exception is thrown when you try to use the constructor. 不会引发异常时调用方法。No exception is thrown when the method is called. - 如果希望默认构造函数来执行多个只需调用基类的默认构造函数或调用另一个构造函数的基类，或执行其他操作完全，则必须使用方法创建一个，并提供您自己的实现。If you want a default constructor that does something more than simply calling the default constructor of the base class, or that calls another constructor of the base class, or that does something else entirely, you must use the method to create one, and provide your own implementation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用`DefineConstructor`的动态类型上设置构造函数的特定签名和属性并返回相应MSIL 填充。The following code sample demonstrates the use of `DefineConstructor` to set a constructor's particular signature and attributes on a dynamic type and return a corresponding for MSIL population. [!code-cpp[TypeBuilder_Sample_4#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_Sample_4/CPP/typebuilder_sample_4.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[TypeBuilder_Sample_4#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_Sample_4/CS/typebuilder_sample_4.cs#2)] [!code-vb[TypeBuilder_Sample_4#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_Sample_4/VB/typebuilder_sample_4.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法将使当前类型的泛型类型。Calling this method makes the current type a generic type. 如果对相同的类型，再次调用该方法引发。If the method is called again on the same type, an is thrown. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用两个类型参数创建泛型类型，并将它们保存在程序集 GenericEmitExample1.dll。The following code example creates a generic type with two type parameters and saves them in the assembly GenericEmitExample1.dll. 可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)若要查看生成的类型。You can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to view the generated types. 定义动态的泛型类型中涉及的步骤的更多详细说明，请参阅[如何：使用反射发出定义泛型类型](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-type-with-reflection-emit.md)。For a more detailed explanation of the steps involved in defining a dynamic generic type, see [How to: Define a Generic Type with Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/how-to-define-a-generic-type-with-reflection-emit.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 在定义的方法时不知道方法签名时，请使用此方法的重载。Use this method overload when you do not know the method signature at the time you define the method. 例如，可能通过后该方法已添加到该类型必须定义的方法的泛型类型参数指定的参数类型和泛型方法的返回类型。For example, the parameter types and return type of a generic method might be specified by the method's generic type parameters, which must be defined after the method has been added to the type. 参数和返回类型的方法可以设置更高版本使用方法。The parameters and return type of the method can be set later using the method. 此方法的重载定义的方法与。This method overload defines a method with . 如果您需要定义没有签名，而且不同调用约定的方法使用方法重载。If you need to define a method without a signature, with a different calling convention, use the method overload. ## Examples 下面的代码示例定义一个名为泛型方法`DemoMethod`其泛型类型参数指定的参数类型和返回类型。The following code example defines a generic method named `DemoMethod` whose parameter type and return type are specified by its generic type parameters. 如果没有签名，使用标准调用约定定义方法。The method is defined without a signature, using the standard calling convention. 方法用来使`DemoMethod`泛型方法，并新定义的类型参数，然后用于签名和返回类型。The method is used to make `DemoMethod` a generic method, and the newly defined type parameters are then used for the signature and return type. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分方法。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你需要指定自定义修饰符，请使用此重载。Use this overload if you need to specify custom modifiers. 如果需要指定自定义修饰符之后创建方法后，就像，例如，使用泛型方法的参数类型指定由其泛型类型参数，您可以使用或方法重载，可定义方法，然后使用方法以定义参数和返回类型与自定义修饰符。If you need to specify custom modifiers after the method has been created, as you would, for example, with a generic method whose parameter types are specified by its generic type parameters, you can use the or method overloads to define the method and then use the method to define the parameter and return types with custom modifiers. > [!NOTE] > 自定义修饰符的详细信息，请参阅 ECMA 分区 II 元数据文档。For more information on custom modifiers, see the ECMA Partition II Metadata documentation. 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site.

span.span: The method body to be used.

summary.span: 指定实现给定方法声明的给定方法体（可能使用其他名称）。

span.span: Specifies a given method body that implements a given method declaration, potentially with a different name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不使用此方法以发出方法重写或接口实现。Do not use this method to emit method overrides or interface implementations. 若要重写基类的方法或实现接口的方法，只需发出具有相同名称和签名的方法作为要重写或实现，该方法中的代码示例所示。To override a method of a base class or to implement a method of an interface, simply emit a method with the same name and signature as the method to be overridden or implemented, as demonstrated in the code example. 方法主体和方法声明具有不同的名称时使用方法。The method is used when a method body and a method declaration have different names. 例如，类可能会重写基类方法，并还为一个单独的实现接口成员具有相同的名称，如代码示例所示。For example, a class might override a base class method and also provide a separate implementation for an interface member with the same name, as demonstrated in the code example. `DefineMethodOverride` 定义`methodimpl`，其中包含对元数据标记。`DefineMethodOverride` defines a `methodimpl`, which consists of a pair of metadata tokens. 一个令牌将指向实现，且其他令牌指向正文实现的声明。One token points to an implementation, and the other token points to a declaration that the body implements. 必须定义此方法实现的类型上定义正文和主体必须是虚拟 (`Overridable`在 Visual Basic 中)。The body must be defined on the type the method impl is defined on, and the body must be virtual (`Overridable` in Visual Basic). 可以对接口实现的类型、 派生类上的方法或类型中定义的方法上定义的方法进行声明。The declaration can be made to a method defined on an interface implemented by the type, a method on a derived class, or a method defined in the type. 如果该声明是在仅接口上，更改接口定义的槽。If the declaration is on an interface only, the slot defined for the interface is altered. 如果对基类型上的方法进行声明时，重写该方法的槽和重写方法的任何重复项也被替换。If the declaration is made to a method on a base type, the slot for the method is overridden and any duplicates for the overridden method are also replaced. 重写的方法不能声明的实际方法。The overridden method cannot be the actual method that is declared. 如果方法是在同一类型上，则将替换槽和替换方法的任何重复项将被重写。If the method is on the same type, the slot is replaced and any duplicates for the replaced methods are overridden. > [!NOTE] > 有关方法 impls 详细信息，请参阅`MethodImpl`ECMA 分区 II 元数据文档中。For more information about method impls, see `MethodImpl` in the ECMA Partition II Metadata documentation. 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. > [!IMPORTANT] > 之后调用方法时，某些功能的`methodInfoBody`不能更改。After the method is called, some features of `methodInfoBody` cannot be changed. 例如，无法将属性应用于泛型类型参数的`methodInfoBody`通过使用方法。For example, you cannot apply an attribute to a generic type parameter of `methodInfoBody` by using the method. 如果必须使用方法中，执行此操作后的所有特征`methodInfoBody`已定义。If you must use the method, do so after all characteristics of `methodInfoBody` have been defined. ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含一个接口`I`使用一种方法`M()`，基类`A`接口，并且派生的类，它实现`C`的重写基类实现的`M()`以及提供了一个单独的显式实现的`I.M()`。The following code example contains an interface `I` with a method `M()`, a base class `A` that implements the interface, and a derived class `C` that overrides the base class implementation of `M()` and also provides a separate explicit implementation of `I.M()`. `main()`方法的代码示例演示如何发出派生的类`C`。The `main()` method of the code example shows how to emit the derived class `C`. 重写`A.M()`只需通过发出一种方法来实现`M()`具有相同的签名。The override of `A.M()` is accomplished simply by emitting a method `M()` with the same signature. 但是，若要提供的单独实现`I.M()`，必须定义方法正文，然后使用方法以将该方法正文，其中含有相关联表示`I.M()`。However, to provide a separate implementation of `I.M()`, you must define a method body and then use the method to associate that method body with a representing `I.M()`. 方法主体的名称并不重要。The name of the method body does not matter. 代码示例创建发出类的实例。The code example creates an instance of the emitted class. 它会获取对象`I.M()`，并使用它来调用发出的类的显式接口实现。It obtains a object for `I.M()`, and uses it to invoke the emitted class's explicit interface implementation. 然后，它获取对象`A.M()`，并使用它来调用该方法发出的类重写。It then obtains a object for `A.M()`, and uses it to invoke the emitted class's override of that method. [!code-cpp[TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride/cpp/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder.DefineMethodOverride/vb/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于创建嵌套类型甚至后对封闭类型调用方法。This method can be used to create nested types even after the method has been called on the enclosing type. 嵌套的类型需要在完成之前可以使用它反映， ，或。The nested type needs to be complete before you can reflect on it using , , or . 请参阅的说明嵌套的类型和嵌套类型应完成的顺序。See the description of for the order in which nested types and nesting types should be completed. 重复的名称不一定是创建如果`name`等同于以前定义的类型或嵌套的类型的名称。A duplicate name is not necessarily created if `name` is identical to the name of a previously defined type or nested type. 若要重复项的完整名称必须相同，包括命名空间和所有嵌套的类型。To be duplicates, the full names must be the same, including the namespace and all nesting types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于创建嵌套类型甚至后对封闭类型调用方法。This method can be used to create nested types even after the method has been called on the enclosing type. 嵌套的类型需要在完成之前可以使用它反映， ，或。The nested type needs to be complete before you can reflect on it using , , or . 请参阅的说明嵌套的类型和嵌套类型应完成的顺序。See the description of for the order in which nested types and nesting types should be completed. 重复的名称不一定是创建如果`name`等同于以前定义的类型或嵌套的类型的名称。A duplicate name is not necessarily created if `name` is identical to the name of a previously defined type or nested type. 若要重复项的完整名称必须相同，包括命名空间和所有嵌套的类型。To be duplicates, the full names must be the same, including the namespace and all nesting types.

summary.span: 定义 方法，指定方法的名称、定义方法所使用的 DLL 的名称、方法的属性、方法的调用约定、 方法的返回类型、 方法的参数类型，以及 标志。

span.span: The defined method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 DLL 导入属性 (请参阅的说明) 不能指定为此方法的自变量。Some DLL import attributes (see the description of ) cannot be specified as arguments to this method. 例如，在 DLL 导入属性后，必须添加`PInvoke`创建方法，如果该方法返回一个值。For example, the DLL import attribute must be added after the `PInvoke` method is created, if the method returns a value. 该示例演示如何执行此操作。The example shows how to do this. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用方法来创建`PInvoke`方法，以及如何添加在创建后的方法实现标志的标志，通过使用和方法。The following example demonstrates how to use the method to create a `PInvoke` method, and how to add the flag to the method implementation flags after you create the , by using the and methods. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要获取一个非零返回值，必须添加标志。To get a non-zero return value, you must add the flag. 该示例具有一个动态模块和一个类型、 创建动态程序集`MyType`，，其中包含`PInvoke`方法。The example creates a dynamic assembly with one dynamic module and a single type, `MyType`, that contains the `PInvoke` method. `PInvoke`方法表示 Win32`GetTickCount`函数。The `PInvoke` method represents the Win32 `GetTickCount` function. 运行示例时，它执行`PInvoke`方法。When the example is run, it executes the `PInvoke` method. 它还将为 PInvokeTest.dll 保存动态程序集。It also saves the dynamic assembly as PInvokeTest.dll. 可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)检查`MyType`类和`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中)`PInvoke`它包含的方法。You can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the `MyType` class and the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) `PInvoke` method it contains. 在可以编译 Visual Basic 或 C# 程序使用静态`MyType.GetTickCount`方法包括对 DLL 的引用，当您运行 csc.exe 或 vbc.exe; 例如， `/r:PInvokeTest.dll`。You can compile a Visual Basic or C# program that uses the static `MyType.GetTickCount` method by including a reference to the DLL when you run csc.exe or vbc.exe; for example, `/r:PInvokeTest.dll`. [!code-cpp[TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix/cpp/100656_fix.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix/CS/100656_fix.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix/VB/100656_fix.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些 DLL 导入属性 (请参阅的说明) 不能指定为此方法的自变量。Some DLL import attributes (see the description of ) cannot be specified as arguments to this method. 例如，在 DLL 导入属性后，必须添加`PInvoke`创建方法，如果该方法返回一个值。For example, the DLL import attribute must be added after the `PInvoke` method is created, if the method returns a value. 该示例演示如何执行此操作。The example shows how to do this. > [!NOTE] > 自定义修饰符的详细信息，请参阅 ECMA 分区 II 元数据文档。For more information on custom modifiers, see the ECMA Partition II Metadata documentation. 可联机获取该文档；请参阅 MSDN 上的 [ECMA C# 和公共语言基础结构标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212)和 Ecma International 网站上的[标准 ECMA-335 - 公共语言基础结构 (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552)。The documentation is available online; see [ECMA C# and Common Language Infrastructure Standards](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=99212) on MSDN and [Standard ECMA-335 - Common Language Infrastructure (CLI)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65552) on the Ecma International Web site. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 [\]，类型\[\]，键入\[\]，类型\[\]\[\]，类型\[\] \ 方法来创建`PInvoke`方法，以及如何添加到在创建后的方法实现标志的标志，通过使用和方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the [\], Type\[\], Type\[\], Type\[\]\[\], Type\[\]\ method to create a `PInvoke` method, and how to add the flag to the method implementation flags after you create the , by using the and methods. 该示例具有一个动态模块和一个类型、 创建动态程序集`MyType`，，其中包含`PInvoke`方法。The example creates a dynamic assembly with one dynamic module and a single type, `MyType`, that contains the `PInvoke` method. `PInvoke`方法表示 Win32`GetTickCount`函数。The `PInvoke` method represents the Win32 `GetTickCount` function. > [!IMPORTANT] > 若要获取一个非零返回值，必须添加标志。To get a non-zero return value, you must add the flag. > [!NOTE] > 该示例使用未指定自定义修饰符的重载。The example uses an overload that does not specify custom modifiers. 若要指定自定义修饰符，请更改的示例代码以改为使用此方法的重载。To specify custom modifiers, change the example code to use this method overload instead. 运行示例时，它执行`PInvoke`方法。When the example is run, it executes the `PInvoke` method. 它还将为 PInvokeTest.dll 保存动态程序集。It also saves the dynamic assembly as PInvokeTest.dll. 可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)检查`MyType`类和`static`(`Shared` Visual Basic 中)`PInvoke`它包含的方法。You can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to examine the `MyType` class and the `static` (`Shared` in Visual Basic) `PInvoke` method it contains. 在可以编译 Visual Basic 或 C# 程序使用静态`MyType.GetTickCount`方法包括对 DLL 的引用，当您运行 csc.exe 或 vbc.exe; 例如， `/r:PInvokeTest.dll`。You can compile a Visual Basic or C# program that uses the static `MyType.GetTickCount` method by including a reference to the DLL when you run csc.exe or vbc.exe; for example, `/r:PInvokeTest.dll`. [!code-cpp[TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix/cpp/100656_fix.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix/CS/100656_fix.cs#1)] [!code-vb[TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/TypeBuilder_DefinePInvokeMethod_Fix/VB/100656_fix.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了一种方法来获取对象，表示由表示其泛型类型定义一个构造泛型类型的构造函数对象。The method provides a way to get a object that represents a constructor of a constructed generic type whose generic type definition is represented by a object. 例如，假设您有表示的类型的对象`G`在 C# 语法 (`G(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中`generic ref class G`c + + 中) 和一个表示的构造函数的对象`G`。For example, suppose you have a object that represents the type `G` in C# syntax (`G(Of T)` in Visual Basic, `generic ref class G` in C++) and a object that represents a constructor of `G`. 假设`G`的泛型方法类型参数具有`U`创建构造类型的实例`G`。Suppose that `G` has a generic method with type parameter `U` that creates an instance of the constructed type `G`. 若要发出代码以创建构造类型的实例，你需要换而言之，表示此构造类型的构造函数创建的实例的对象`G`。In order to emit the code to create an instance of the constructed type, you need a object that represents the constructor of this constructed type - in other words, that creates an instance of `G`. 若要执行此操作，先调用方法对象，指定对象，表示`U`作为类型参数。To do this, first call the method on the object, specifying the object that represents `U` as the type argument. 然后调用方法的返回值作为参数的方法`type`并且对象，表示的构造函数`G`作为参数`constructor`。Then call the method with the return value of the method as parameter `type` and the object that represents the constructor of `G` as parameter `constructor`. 返回值是对象需要发出函数调用。The return value is the object you need to emit the function call. 代码示例演示此方案。The code example demonstrates this scenario. ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含一个名为的泛型类的源代码`Sample`具有名为的类型参数`T`。The following code example contains source code for a generic class named `Sample` that has a type parameter named `T`. 类具有一个名为字段`Field`，类型的`T`，和一个名为泛型方法`GM`有其自己的类型参数，名为`U`。The class has a field named `Field`, of type `T`, and a generic method named `GM` with its own type parameter, named `U`. 方法`GM`创建的实例`Sample`，并替换其自身类型参数`U`的类型参数`Sample`，并将存储在其输入的参数`Field`。Method `GM` creates an instance of `Sample`, substituting its own type parameter `U` for the type parameter of `Sample`, and stores its input parameter in `Field`. 编译但未使用; 此源代码您可以查看与它[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)并将其与由类生成的代码比较`Example`。This source code is compiled but not used; you can view it with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) and compare it to the code emitted by class `Example`. 类中的代码`Example`演示如何使用方法发出泛型代码。The code in class `Example` demonstrates the use of the method to emit generic code. `Main`类方法`Example`创建动态程序集包含一个名为类`Sample`，并使用方法，使其通过添加一个名为的类型参数泛型`T`。The `Main` method of class `Example` creates a dynamic assembly containing a class named `Sample` and uses the method to make it generic by adding a type parameter named `T`. 默认构造函数和一个名为字段`Field`，类型的`T`，添加到类`Sample`。A default constructor and a field named `Field`, of type `T`, are added to class `Sample`. 一种方法`GM`添加并转换为泛型方法使用方法。A method `GM` is added and turned into a generic method by using the method. 类型参数`GM`名为`U`。The type parameter of `GM` is named `U`. 类型参数定义后的签名`GM`通过使用添加方法。After the type parameter is defined, the signature of `GM` is added by using the method. 没有返回类型和所需的否或自定义修饰符，此方法的所有参数都均`null`除`parameterTypes`;`parameterTypes`设置的方法的唯一参数类型`U`，该方法的泛型类型参数。There is no return type and no required or custom modifiers, so all the parameters of this method are `null` except `parameterTypes`; `parameterTypes` sets the type of the method's only parameter to `U`, the method's generic type parameter. 方法主体创建构造类型的实例`Sample`(`Sample(Of U)`在 Visual Basic 中)，将分配到该方法的参数`Field`，然后将输出的值`Field`。The body of the method creates an instance of the constructed type `Sample` (`Sample(Of U)` in Visual Basic), assigns the method's parameter to `Field`, and then prints the value of `Field`. 方法用于创建，表示构造泛型类型的默认构造函数`Sample`中指令创建的实例。The method is used to create a that represents the default constructor of the constructed generic type `Sample` in the instruction that creates the instance. 定义一个虚拟类型来保存的入口点方法`Main`。A dummy type is defined to hold the entry-point method `Main`. 中的正文`Main`，静态`GM`的构造泛型类型上调用方法`Sample`(`Sample(Of Integer)`在 Visual Basic 中)，具有类型替换为`U`。In the body of `Main`, the static `GM` method is invoked on the constructed generic type `Sample` (`Sample(Of Integer)` in Visual Basic), with type substituted for `U`. 当运行的代码示例时，它将发出的程序集保存为 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe。When the code example is run, it saves the emitted assembly as TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe. 你可以运行 TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe，并且可以使用[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)进行比较的代码发出的代码`Sample`编译到自身的代码示例的类。You can run TypeBuilderGetFieldExample.exe, and you can use the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md) to compare the emitted code with the code for the `Sample` class that is compiled into the code example itself. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了一种方法来获取对象，表示由表示其泛型类型定义一个构造泛型类型的字段对象。The method provides a way to get a object that represents a field of a constructed generic type whose generic type definition is represented by a object. 例如，假设您有表示的类型的对象`G`在 C# 语法 (`G(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中`generic ref class G`c + + 中) 和一个表示的字段的对象`public T F`在 C# 语法 (`Public F As T`在 Visual Basic `public: T F` c + + 中) 由定义`G`。For example, suppose you have a object that represents the type `G` in C# syntax (`G(Of T)` in Visual Basic, `generic ref class G` in C++) and a object that represents a field `public T F` in C# syntax (`Public F As T` in Visual Basic, `public: T F` in C++) that is defined by `G`. 假设`G`的泛型方法类型参数具有`U`创建构造类型的实例`G`调用字段和`F`该实例上。Suppose that `G` has a generic method with type parameter `U` that creates an instance of the constructed type `G` and calls field `F` on that instance. 若要发出函数调用，你需要对象，表示`F`上的构造类型-换句话说，这是类型的`U`而不是类型`T`。In order to emit the function call, you need a object that represents `F` on the constructed type - in other words, that is of type `U` rather than type `T`. 若要执行此操作，先调用方法对象，指定对象，表示`U`作为类型参数。To do this, first call the method on the object, specifying the object that represents `U` as the type argument. 然后调用方法的返回值作为参数的方法`type`并且对象，表示`F`作为参数`field`。Then call the method with the return value of the method as parameter `type` and the object that represents `F` as parameter `field`. 返回值是对象需要发出函数调用。The return value is the object you need to emit the function call. 代码示例演示此方案。The code example demonstrates this scenario. ## Examples 下面的代码示例包含一个名为示例具有一个名为的类型参数的泛型类的源代码`T`。The following code example contains source code for a generic class named Sample that has a type parameter named `T`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了一种方法来获取对象，表示构造泛型类型表示其泛型类型定义的方法对象。The method provides a way to get a object that represents a method of a constructed generic type whose generic type definition is represented by a object. 例如，假设您有表示的类型的对象`G`在 C# 语法 (`G(Of T)`在 Visual Basic 中`generic ref class G`c + + 中) 和一个对象，表示一种方法`T M()`在 C# 语法 (`Function M() As T`在 Visual Basic `T M()` c + + 中) 由定义`G`。For example, suppose you have a object that represents the type `G` in C# syntax (`G(Of T)` in Visual Basic, `generic ref class G` in C++) and a object that represents a method `T M()` in C# syntax (`Function M() As T` in Visual Basic, `T M()` in C++) that is defined by `G`. 假设`G`的泛型方法类型参数具有`U`创建构造类型的实例`G`，然后调用方法`M`该实例上。Suppose that `G` has a generic method with type parameter `U` that creates an instance of the constructed type `G` and calls method `M` on that instance. 若要发出函数调用，你需要对象，表示`M`上的构造类型-即，返回类型`U`而不是类型`T`。In order to emit the function call, you need a object that represents `M` on the constructed type - in other words, that returns type `U` rather than type `T`. 若要执行此操作，先调用方法对象，指定对象，表示`U`作为类型参数。To do this, first call the method on the object, specifying the object that represents `U` as the type argument. 然后调用方法的返回值作为参数的方法`type`并且对象，表示`T M()`作为参数`method`。Then call the method with the return value of the method as parameter `type` and the object that represents `T M()` as parameter `method`. 返回值是对象需要发出函数调用。The return value is the object you need to emit the function call. 代码示例演示类似于以下的方案。The code example demonstrates a scenario similar to this. ## Examples remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在方法声明中的参数数量等于指定的参数列表中的参数数目和每个自变量的类型可以转换为参数的类型绑定器将调用一个方法。A method will be invoked if the number of parameters in the method declaration equals the number of arguments in the specified argument list, and the type of each argument can be converted by the binder to the type of the parameter. 联编程序将查找所有匹配的方法。The binder will find all of the matching methods. 查找这些方法所基于的绑定请求 （BindingFlags.InvokeMethod、 BindingFlags.GetProperties，依次类推。） 的类型。These methods are found based on the type of binding requested (BindingFlags.InvokeMethod, BindingFlags.GetProperties, and so on.). 按名称、 数量的参数，并搜索修饰符联编程序中定义的一组筛选的组的方法。The set of methods is filtered by the name, number of arguments, and a set of search modifiers defined in the binder. 选择该方法后，将调用它。After the method is selected, it will be invoked. 此时，检查可访问性。Accessibility is checked at that point. 搜索可以基于与方法关联的可访问性属性来控制搜索的组的方法。The search can control which set of methods are searched based upon the accessibility attribute associated with the method. `IBinder.BindToMethod`方法负责选择要调用的方法。The `IBinder.BindToMethod` method is responsible for selecting the method to be invoked. 默认联编程序选择最精确的匹配。The default binder selects the most specific match. > [!NOTE] > 对于完全受信任的代码将忽略访问限制。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 也就是说，私有构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性可以访问并完全受信任代码时使用反射来调用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked using Reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. 目前尚不支持此方法。This method is not currently supported. 可以使用类型来检索或，检索到的类型使用反射。You can retrieve the type using or and use reflection on the retrieved type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ， ，和属性报告类型的透明度级别，因为由公共语言运行时 (CLR)。The , , and properties report the transparency level of the type, as determined by the common language runtime (CLR). 下表中显示这些属性的组合：The combinations of these properties are shown in the following table: |安全级别Security level|IsSecurityCriticalIsSecurityCritical|IsSecurityCriticalIsSecuritySafeCritical|IsSecurityTransparentIsSecurityTransparent| |--------------------|------------------------|----------------------------|---------------------------| |严重Critical|`true`|`false`|`false`| |安全-关键Safe-critical|`true`|`true`|`false`| |透明Transparent|`false`|`false`|`true`| 使用这些属性比检查程序集及其类型的安全批注、检查当前的信任级别，以及尝试复制运行时的规则要简单得多。Using these properties is much simpler than examining the security annotations of an assembly and its types, checking the current trust level, and attempting to duplicate the runtime's rules. 在运行时开始计算程序集的透明度级别。The runtime begins evaluating transparency levels at the assembly. 例如，如果动态程序集是安全关键，类型上的注释将被忽略，并且所有类型都是安全关键。For example, if the dynamic assembly is security-critical, annotations on types are ignored, and all types are security-critical. 默认情况下，动态程序集继承透明度发出它的程序集。By default, a dynamic assembly inherits the transparency of the assembly that emits it. 可以使用来覆盖此默认值， ，或方法重载并指定安全属性。You can override this default by using the , , or method overload and specifying security attributes. 不能通过执行此操作; 操作提升安全级别也就是说，透明代码不能发出安全关键或安全可靠关键代码。You cannot elevate security levels by doing this; that is, transparent code cannot emit security-critical or security-safe-critical code. 创建动态程序集，或直到已保存到磁盘并重新加载该程序集不会生效时，必须指定属性。Attributes must be specified when the dynamic assembly is created, or they do not take effect until the assembly has been saved to disk and reloaded. > [!NOTE] > 默认继承被限制为运行时的评估的透明度。Default inheritance is limited to the runtime's evaluation of transparency. 没有属性应用于动态程序集。No attributes are applied to the dynamic assembly. 如果你想要添加的安全属性，您必须自行应用它们。If you want to add security attributes, you must apply them yourself. 有关反射发出和透明度，请参阅[反射发出中的安全问题](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md)。For more information about reflection emit and transparency, see [Security Issues in Reflection Emit](~/docs/framework/reflection-and-codedom/security-issues-in-reflection-emit.md). 有关透明度的信息，请参阅[安全更改](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md)。For information about transparency, see [Security Changes](~/docs/framework/security/security-changes.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了一种方法来生成任何可能的元素类型，包括泛型类型的数组类型。The method provides a way to generate an array type with any possible element type, including generic types. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个动态模块、 名为抽象类型`Sample`，和一个名为的抽象方法`TestMethod`。The following code example creates a dynamic module, an abstract type named `Sample`, and an abstract method named `TestMethod`. `TestMethod` 采用`ref`参数 (`ByRef`在 Visual Basic 中) 的类型`Sample`，指向类型的指针`Sample`，和类型的数组`Sample`。`TestMethod` takes a `ref` parameter (`ByRef` in Visual Basic) of type `Sample`, a pointer to type `Sample`, and an array of type `Sample`. 它将返回类型的二维数组`Sample`。It returns a two-dimensional array of type `Sample`. 代码示例将动态模块保存到磁盘，以便你可以检查其与[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)。The code example saves the dynamic module to disk, so you can examine it with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md). remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了一种方法来生成`ref`类型 (`ByRef`在 Visual Basic 中) 参数列出了。The method provides a way to generate `ref` types (`ByRef` in Visual Basic) for parameter lists. > [!NOTE] > 使用 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 语法中，如果当前表示`MyType`，则此方法返回的类型将为`MyType&`。Using Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) syntax, if the current represents `MyType`, then the type returned by this method would be `MyType&`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个动态模块、 名为抽象类型`Sample`，和一个名为的抽象方法`TestMethod`。The following code example creates a dynamic module, an abstract type named `Sample`, and an abstract method named `TestMethod`. `TestMethod` 采用`ref`参数 (`ByRef`在 Visual Basic 中) 的类型`Sample`，指向类型的指针`Sample`，和类型的数组`Sample`。`TestMethod` takes a `ref` parameter (`ByRef` in Visual Basic) of type `Sample`, a pointer to type `Sample`, and an array of type `Sample`. 它将返回类型的二维数组`Sample`。It returns a two-dimensional array of type `Sample`. 代码示例将动态模块保存到磁盘，以便你可以检查其与[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)。The code example saves the dynamic module to disk, so you can examine it with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md). [!code-csharp[MakeXxxTypeBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MakeXxxTypeBuilder/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MakeXxxTypeBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MakeXxxTypeBuilder/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此方法时发出的代码要求从当前泛型类型定义构造的类型。Use this method when your emitted code requires a type constructed from the current generic type definition. 不需要调用方法之前调用方法表示泛型类型定义。It is not necessary to call the method before calling the method on a that represents a generic type definition. 如果当前不表示泛型类型的定义引发。If the current does not represent the definition of a generic type, an is thrown. 通过此方法的函数返回作为发出的代码构造的泛型类型的占位符的对象。The object returned by this method functions as a placeholder for a constructed generic type in your emitted code. 它是派生自的类的实例方面能力有限。It is an instance of a class derived from that has limited capabilities. 具体而言：In particular: - 若要获取这些构造的泛型类型的方法、 字段和构造函数，使用， ，和方法重载。To get methods, fields, and constructors for these constructed generic types, use the , , and method overloads. - 表示相同的构造的类型的两个实例不相等。Two instances that represent the same constructed type do not compare as equal. 例如，在下面的代码`t1.Equals(t2)`返回`false`:For example, in the following code `t1.Equals(t2)` returns `false`: [!code-cpp[System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.emit.typebuilder.makegenerictype/cpp/remarks.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.emit.typebuilder.makegenerictype/cs/remarks.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Reflection.Emit.TypeBuilder.MakeGenericType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.reflection.emit.typebuilder.makegenerictype/vb/remarks.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供了一种方法生成参数列表的指针类型。The method provides a way to generate pointer types for parameter lists. > [!NOTE] > 使用 Microsoft 中间语言 (MSIL) 语法中，如果当前表示`MyType`，则此方法返回的类型将为`MyType*`。Using Microsoft intermediate language (MSIL) syntax, if the current represents `MyType`, then the type returned by this method would be `MyType*`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例创建一个动态模块、 名为抽象类型`Sample`，和一个名为的抽象方法`TestMethod`。The following code example creates a dynamic module, an abstract type named `Sample`, and an abstract method named `TestMethod`. `TestMethod` 采用`ref`参数 (`ByRef`在 Visual Basic 中) 的类型`Sample`，指向类型的指针`Sample`，和类型的数组`Sample`。`TestMethod` takes a `ref` parameter (`ByRef` in Visual Basic) of type `Sample`, a pointer to type `Sample`, and an array of type `Sample`. 它将返回类型的二维数组`Sample`。It returns a two-dimensional array of type `Sample`. 代码示例将动态模块保存到磁盘，以便你可以检查其与[Ildasm.exe （IL 反汇编程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md)。The code example saves the dynamic module to disk, so you can examine it with the [Ildasm.exe (IL Disassembler)](~/docs/framework/tools/ildasm-exe-il-disassembler.md). [!code-csharp[MakeXxxTypeBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MakeXxxTypeBuilder/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MakeXxxTypeBuilder#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/MakeXxxTypeBuilder/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`parent`是`null`，用作基类型。If `parent` is `null`, is used as the base type. 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 中，如果引发任何异常`parent`是一个接口类型，但时，将引发调用方法。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, no exception is thrown if `parent` is an interface type, but a is thrown when the method is called. 方法不会检查对于大多数无效的父类型。The method does not check for most invalid parent types. 例如，不拒绝的父类型没有默认构造函数时当前类型具有默认构造函数，它不拒绝密封的类型，并且不拒绝类型。For example, it does not reject a parent type that has no default constructor when the current type has a default constructor, it does not reject sealed types, and it does not reject the type. 在所有这些情况下，由所引发的异常方法。In all these cases, exceptions are thrown by the method.
